CutSceneText.Text: Very good. This gentleman will take you there.
Pay close attention to what he says. Get it?
Of course. I'd like to give this food ration to Ron quickly!
Right then, shall we set off?
Chumoria! Why are you here? It's dangerous here!
Ron! I've brought you something to eat.
Really? Thank you! But how did you get here?
Ah, I see. Thank you very much.
No, not at all. I'm just taking a break. Shall we look and see what's in the package?
